content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want the lowest price possible. Can you tell me the price of the apartment?

I am also looking for a reliable and responsible tenant. Do you have any questions for me?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Emilia. Unfortunately, I cannot provide you with the price of the apartment without first discussing the terms and conditions of the rental agreement. As a landlord, I am looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who will pay the rent on time and maintain the property in good condition.

Do you have any experience with renting apartments in Munich? And can you provide references from previous landlords or tenants?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I have experience with renting apartments in Munich. I can provide references from previous landlords or tenants. I can also provide a copy of my ID and proof of income.

What is your minimum rental price for this apartment? And what is the length of the rental agreement?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for providing your references, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to provide proof of your income and ID.

As for the minimum rental price for this apartment, I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay at least 1,200 Euros per month. The length of the rental agreement is one year, with the possibility of renewal for another year.

I hope this information is helpful to you. Let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
